body.p:
Department of the Ohio,
Branch Office, Adjutant General's Department,
Lexington, Kentucky, March 16th, 1864.

3,, The resignation of Captain Benjamin C. Haley 45th Ky. Mt'd Inf. vols "for the good at the service" is hereby accepted, to take effect March 17th, 1864, with the condition that he shall recieve no final payments until he has satisfied the Pay Department that he is in no wise indebted to the Government.

By Command of Major General Schofield:
J. Bates Dickson
Assistant Adjutant General.
Order accepting Resignation for good of the service
